resources.string:
- Fully featured anime/manga search 
- Detailed view of anime, manga, characters, staff, studios, users, etc. 
- News RSS feeds from AnimeNewsNetwork and Crunchyroll News 
- Global user activity

- AniList account log in 
- Edit, rate, favorite anime/manga/etc. 
- Search more types like characters, staff, studios, users 
- Watching/reading and user lists

- Completely remove ads 
- Unlocks experimental database features: 
	- Track art prints, CDs, or merch in general from anime conventions 
	- Import/export 
	- Integration with AniList API to tag art/CDs with characters and staff 
	- Tag and search with artist, convention source, sizing, characters, media, etc.
